data_desc: Authoritatively ranked lists of books sold in the United States, sorted by format and genre.

data.title: THE DEMON OF UNREST
data.author: by Erik Larson
data.desc: The author of “The Splendid and the Vile” portrays the months between the election of Abraham Lincoln and the beginning of the Civil War.

data.title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION
data.author: by Jonathan Haidt
data.desc: A co-author of “The Coddling of the American Mind” looks at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children.

data.title: WHAT THIS COMEDIAN SAID WILL SHOCK YOU
data.author: by Bill Maher
data.desc: The host of “Real Time With Bill Maher” gives his take on a variety of subjects in American culture and politics.

data.title: THE END OF EVERYTHING
data.author: by Victor Davis Hanson
data.desc: The author of “The Dying Citizen” and “The Case for Trump” looks at how some societies obliterate their foes.

data.title: THE SITUATION ROOM
data.author: by George Stephanopoulos with Lisa Dickey
data.desc: The ABC host and former adviser to President Clinton describes the location where and conditions under which a dozen presidential administrations handled crises.
